> Blink as you hit the spacebar. You'll then not see it.

Just blink? Seriously? Is it really to much to ask that Squad produce similar or better work than unpaid modders? Maybe I just expect to much from the companies I support.
Think on the bright side. Put a Kerbal on a command chair inside the fairing. Explain that they got so tired of capsules exploding they just worked it into the design.

> 
> To bad they couldn't delay 1.0 until is was 1.0 ready.

There will always be something else that someone feels that 1.0 should have. From what I've seen so far, the game is good enough to be called 1.0.

Yes, I'm being serious. Nobody's shown how the fairings work interstage (because they're too busy being "funny" and making sure Val is in every command pod) but if you can keep the vomit down during fairing separation I think it'll work perfectly for a Saturn V replica.

And "better" is subjective. You think it's horrifically worse. I think it's different and would prefer clamshells, but will happily use the stock fairings and be happy to check yet another must-install mod off the list.
